definitions.title: Pa.
definitions.body: id., [[תַּשְׁמִישׁ]] use; Palm. [[שמש]], [[תשמיש]], SAC:114, cf. 122 Lzb:379; Syr. 4ame4, 0e4me4to0; Chr-Pal.4m4 Pa, t4m4 NH [[שִׁמֵּשׁ]], [[תַּשְׁמִישׁ]]; Egypt. šms, servant, Kopt. šemše, cf. WMM in Buhl:14);—Impf. 3 mpl. sf. [[יְשַׁמְּשׁוּנֵּתּ]] Da 7:10 were ministering to him.
